#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(arm_compiler)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "-lz")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-O3")
# set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "-g -D_DEBUG")
set(GCC_COVERAGE_COMPILE_FLAGS "-D_ARM32  -Wno-unused-function -Wall")
add_definitions(${GCC_COVERAGE_COMPILE_FLAGS})
add_executable(obc ../../compiler.cpp ../../compiler.h ../../context.cpp ../../context.h ../../emit.cpp ../../emit.h ../../intermediate.cpp ../../intermediate.h ../../linker.cpp ../../linker.h ../../optimization.cpp ../../optimization.h ../../parser.cpp ../../parser.h ../../posix_main.cpp ../../scanner.cpp ../../scanner.h ../../tree.cpp ../../tree.h ../../types.cpp ../../types.h ../../../shared/logger.cpp ../../../shared/logger.h)
target_link_libraries(obc "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
